entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
